3012146902:
Current Mission: Retrieve 12 Chozo Artifacts
Defeat Meta Ridley
Defeat Metroid Prime
1343145632:
The &main-color=#89D6FF;Combat Visor&main-color=#FF6705B3; is your default Visor. It provides you with a Heads-Up Display (HUD) containing radar, mini-map, lock-on reticules, threat assessment, energy gauge, and Missile count.

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,F13452F8,C042EC91; to select the Combat Visor.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Icons for the Arm Cannons you possess are shown in the lower-right corner of the Combat Visor.

Icons for the Visors you possess are shown in the lower-left corner of the Combat Visor.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Scan Visor&main-color=#FF6705B3; is used to collect data. Some devices will activate when scanned.

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,F13452F8,B306E26F; to select the Scan Visor. Move the Visor over targets with this symbol &image=SI,0.70,0.68,FD41E145;, then press and hold &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; to scan. 

Use &image=SI,0.6,0.85,F13452F8; to select another available Visor or press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,05AF9CAA; to turn the Visor off.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Mission-critical scan targets &image=SI,0.70,0.68,BCE843F2; will be red in color. 

Scanning enemies with this Visor can reveal their vulnerabilities.

You will be unable to fire any weapons while the Scan Visor is active.

Scanned data vital to the success of the mission is downloaded and stored in the &main-color=#89D6FF;Log Book&main-color=#FF6705B3; section of the Pause Screen. 

Press &image=A,3.0,08A2E4B9,F2425B21; on this screen to access the Log Book.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;X-Ray Visor&main-color=#FF6705B3; can see through certain types of materials. 

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,F13452F8,8ADA8184; to select the X-Ray Visor.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The X-Ray Visor can reveal invisible items, areas, and enemies.

Robotic enemies jam the X-Ray Visor's frequency. Eliminate them to restore function to the Visor.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Thermal Visor&main-color=#FF6705B3; allows you to see in the infrared spectrum. Hot objects are bright in the Visor, while colder ones are dim.

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,F13452F8,5F556002; to select the Thermal Visor.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Thermal Visor will show the weak points of certain foes.

Use the Thermal Visor to see in total darkness and poor weather conditions. 

Brightly lit areas, explosions, and intense heat can impair the Thermal Visor.

Enemies with temperatures close to their surroundings will be tough to spot with this Visor.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Power Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the default Arm Cannon. It has the best rate of fire.

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,2A13C23E,A91A7703; to select the Power Beam as your active weapon.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Power Beam can be used to open Blue Doors.

If you see your shots ricochet, cease fire. The Power Beam is not working against that target.

You can use the Power Beam to quickly clear an area of weak foes.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Super Missile&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the &main-color=#89D6FF;Power&main-color=#FF6705B3; Charge Combo.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Super Missile is a Single Shot Charge Combo. Each shot costs 5 Missiles.

Super Missiles can destroy objects made of &main-color=#89D6FF;Cordite&main-color=#FF6705B3;.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Ice Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3; can freeze enemies solid. Hits from the Ice Beam may also slow foes down.  

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,2A13C23E,12A12131; to select the Ice Beam as your active weapon.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Use the Ice Beam to open White Doors.

The Ice Beam is quite effective against fire-based creatures.

Charge the Ice Beam to increase the time an enemy will stay frozen when hit.

Some frozen enemies can be shattered by Missile hits.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Ice Spreader&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the &main-color=#89D6FF;Ice&main-color=#FF6705B3; Charge Combo. It can freeze targets in a wide area.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Ice Spreader is a Single Shot Charge Combo. Each shot costs 10 Missiles.

Ice Spreader is limited against aerial targets.

The&main-color=#89D6FF; Wave Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3; fires powerful electric bolts. This weapon has a limited homing capability as well.

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,2A13C23E,CD7B1ACA; to select the Wave Beam as your active weapon.
  
&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Fire the Wave Beam to open Purple Doors.

The Wave Beam won't home in on targets without a lock-on. Press and hold &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; to lock on.

Charge the Wave Beam to fire a fierce electric blast. Enemies struck by this blast will be enveloped in electrical energy for a few moments.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Wavebuster&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the &main-color=#89D6FF;Wave&main-color=#FF6705B3; Charge Combo. This potent blast auto-seeks targets in the area.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Wavebuster is a Sustained Fire Charge Combo. It costs 10 Missiles to activate, then 5 Missiles per second afterward.

The Wavebuster will seek enemies without a lock-on.

The&main-color=#89D6FF; Plasma Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3; fires streams of molten energy. This Beam can ignite flammable objects and enemies.

Press &image=SA,3.0,0.6,0.85,A9798329,2A13C23E; to select the Plasma Beam as your active weapon.
  
&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Fire the Plasma Beam to open Red Doors.

The Plasma Beam is very effective against cold-based enemies.

Charge the Plasma Beam to fire a sphere of plasma. Enemies struck by this blast will be engulfed in flames for a few moments.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Flamethrower&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the &main-color=#89D6FF;Plasma&main-color=#FF6705B3; Charge Combo. You can sweep its stream of flame across multiple targets.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Flamethrower is a Sustained Fire Charge Combo. It costs 10 Missiles to activate, then 5 Missiles per second afterward.

The Flamethrower is most effective against multiple targets in an area.

The viral corruption of the Power Suit has altered the Arm Cannon as well. It is now capable of firing the powerful&main-color=#89D6FF; Phazon Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3;.
 
&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Phazon Beam appears to trigger in the presence of high concentrations of Phazon.

Regular Arm Cannon functions return when Phazon is not present.

The Charge Beam does not function when the Phazon Beam is active.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#FF6705B3; increase the leaping capability of the Power Suit through the use of boot-mounted thrusters.  

Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,833BEE04; to jump, then press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,833BEE04; again during the jump to use the Space Jump Boots.


&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Timing is important when using the Space Jump Boots. 

Experiment to discover ways to increase the height and length of your jumps.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Grapple Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3; allows you to swing back and forth from special points in the environment.  

Grapple Points appear in your Visor as a &image=SI,0.70,0.68,2702E5E0; icon. 

Press and hold &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; to fire the Grapple Beam. 

Hold &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; down to stay connected; let go to release.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Grapple Beam can be used to cross large gaps.

Use the &image=SA,7.0,0.6,1.0,C6C483AC,4050F102,8B0C22A7,4050F102,3A446C61,BCD01ECF,778CCD6A,BCD01ECF; while grappling to swing in different directions.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Missile Launcher&main-color=#FF6705B3; adds ballistic weapon capability to the Arm Cannon.

Press &image=SI,1.0,0.68,EA2A1C5C; to fire the Missile Launcher. Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,05AF9CAA; to return to Beam mode.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Missiles fired with a lock-on will seek their targets.

Missiles can destroy objects made from &main-color=#89D6FF;Radion&main-color=#FF6705B3; or &main-color=#89D6FF;Brinstone&main-color=#FF6705B3;.

There are Charge Combo enhancements scattered throughout the environment. They use the Missile Launcher and the Charge Beam in tandem to fire more effective blasts.

Each Missile Expansion you find will increase the number of Missiles you can carry by 5.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Power Suit&main-color=#FF6705B3; is an advanced Chozo exoskeleton modified for use by Samus Aran.  

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Power Suit provides life-support functions and is well shielded from attack.  
  
The modular nature of the Power Suit allows for the addition of weapons, Visors, and other gear as needed.

The Power Suit's shielding loses energy with each hit; collect energy when possible to keep the shielding charged.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Varia Suit&main-color=#FF6705B3; adds increased heat resistance to the Power Suit.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
This modification increases your defensive shielding.

While the Varia Suit can handle higher temperatures than normal, extreme heat sources and heat-based attacks will still cause damage.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Gravity Suit&main-color=#FF6705B3; eliminates the effects of liquid on movement.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
This modification improves your defensive shielding.

The Gravity Suit allows for improved movement in liquid environments, but does not reduce damage delivered when exposed to hazardous fluids.

Visor modifications in the Gravity Suit make it easier to see underwater.

The Power Suit has been corrupted by viral exposure, turning it into the &main-color=#89D6FF;Phazon Suit&main-color=#FF6705B3;. 

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The viral corruption of the Power Suit has some beneficial side effects. 

The suit is now resistant to the effects of Blue Phazon. The suit is not invulnerable to the effects of all Phazon, however.

In addition to Phazon resistance, the corruption has dramatically increased defensive shielding levels.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Energy Tanks&main-color=#FF6705B3; increase the power level available to your Suit's defense screens.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Each Energy Tank increases your Suit's energy by 100 units. The more energy your Suit has, the longer you can stay alive.

You can fully recharge your Energy Tanks at Save Stations. Your gunship has this capability as well.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Morph Ball&main-color=#FF6705B3; changes your Suit into a compact, mobile sphere.  

Press &image=SI,0.70,1.0,2176CFF9; to enter Morph Ball mode.

Press &image=SI,0.70,1.0,2176CFF9; again to leave Morph Ball mode.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Like the Power Suit, the Morph Ball is modular. There are several modifications that can be added to improve performance.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Boost Ball&main-color=#FF6705B3; can be used to increase the Morph Ball's speed for short periods.

Press and hold &image=SI,0.70,0.68,833BEE04; to charge, then release &image=SI,0.70,0.68,833BEE04; to trigger a quick boost of speed.
 
&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
When charging, the longer you hold &image=SI,0.70,0.68,833BEE04;, the longer (and faster) the Boost Charge will be.

Throughout the environment you will encounter U-shaped channels known as half-pipes. Using the Boost Ball in these areas will let you reach higher places. 

Build a charge as you descend in the half-pipe, then trigger the Boost as you ascend the other side. This will give you the speed and momentum you need to reach new heights.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Spider Ball&main-color=#FF6705B3; allows you to move the Morph Ball along magnetic rails.

Press and hold &image=A,3.0,08A2E4B9,F2425B21; to activate the Spider Ball ability.
 
&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Follow the magnetic rails to explore new areas.

The Morph Ball Bomb can be used to trigger a Bomb Jump while attached to a rail.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Morph Ball Bomb&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the default weapon for the Morph Ball.

Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,05AF9CAA; when in Morph Ball mode to drop a Morph Ball Bomb. 

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Morph Ball Bomb can be used to break cracked walls and activate certain devices.

If the Morph Ball is near a Morph Ball Bomb when it explodes, it will be popped a short distance into the air. This is called a&main-color=#89D6FF; Bomb Jump&main-color=#FF6705B3;. 

When a Morph Ball Bomb explodes, it must be close to the enemy to be effective.

The Morph Ball Bomb can easily break items made of&main-color=#89D6FF; Sandstone&main-color=#FF6705B3; or&main-color=#89D6FF; Talloric Alloy&main-color=#FF6705B3;.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Power Bomb&main-color=#FF6705B3; is the strongest Morph Ball weapon.

Press &image=SI,1.0,0.68,EA2A1C5C; when in Morph Ball mode to drop a Power Bomb.  

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
Power Bombs do not have unlimited ammo. Use them wisely.

The Power Bomb can destroy many materials, including &main-color=#89D6FF;Bendezium&main-color=#FF6705B3;.

Each Power Bomb Expansion you find will increase the number of Power Bombs you can carry by 1.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Charge Beam&main-color=#FF6705B3; allows you to increase the damage and effectiveness of the Arm Cannon.

Press and hold &image=SI,0.70,0.68,05AF9CAA; to charge the Arm Cannon, then release &image=SI,0.70,0.68,05AF9CAA; to fire.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The Charge Beam has a limited 'tractor beam' capacity.  Use it to pull small objects to you.

There are Charge Combo enhancements scattered through the environment.  They use the Charge Beam and the Missile Launcher in tandem to fire more effective blasts.

The Charge Beam increases the performance of each Arm Cannon mode.

The &main-color=#89D6FF;Charge Combos&main-color=#FF6705B3; allow you to fire the Missile Launcher and Arm Cannon together. The combined attacks are stronger than normal blasts.

The Arm Cannon must be charged to use a Charge Combo.

When your Arm Cannon is charged, press &image=SI,1.0,0.68,EA2A1C5C; to fire the Charge Combo.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Samus's Notes:&main-color=#FF6705B3;
The &main-color=#89D6FF;Single Shot&main-color=#FF6705B3; Charge Combos fire one blast at a time. Each shot uses a number of Missiles.

&main-color=#89D6FF;Sustained Fire&main-color=#FF6705B3; Charge Combos will fire as long as you have Missiles. Hold &image=SI,0.70,0.68,05AF9CAA; down after you fire. It takes ten Missiles to trigger these Charge Combos, then five Missiles per second afterward.

Page down for information on the individual Charge Combos. 

This data will download to the Log Book after each Charge Combo is acquired.
